description:
Escape the track and explore untamed snow. The Escape Outpath are supportive and warm, with classic flex and a hinged cuff for support whether you're in track or out. The high cuff protects your feet when you're breaking new trail.

  • Full gaiter keeps snow out while off-track
  • High cuff with Velcro® strap for a stable, secure fit
  • Abrasion-resistant vamp protects from ski edges
  • Thinsulate™ liner keeps feet warm
  • Touring fit is slightly generous for long-term comfort and 105mm width
name: Salomon Escape Outpath Touring Boots - Unisex
